title: Cafe Xoho
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Bakery, Israeli, Non-veg
description: Serves fish, veg options available. Vegetarian except for a couple fish meat item. Cafe offering breakfast and baked goods, burritos and salads, juices and coffee drinks. The breads and baked goods, spread, pesto, and jam are all made in-house. Vegan dishes are marked with a leaf and include items like chickpea & sprout toast, burrito, and tofu bahn-mi sandwich. Stocks soy and almond milk for coffee (w/extra charge). Healthy drinks menu include a green shake with coconut milk, tahini, mint, and kale.
